title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange in the preview, the color does not appear as expected.
EB: Expectation: The color orange should be displayed correctly in the preview.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. 3. View the preview and check if the color appears correctly.
